original: @1b # // de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya'i gtso bor gyur pa'i 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor bstan nas /
analyzed: @1b # // de ltar chos kyi phyag rgya'i gtso bor gyur pa'i 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor bstan nas /
translated: Having explained the Dharma maṇḍala of the Three-World-Wheel, which is the chief of the Dharma seals,

original: da ni las kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa'i 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
analyzed: da ni las kyi phyag rgya gtso bor gyur pa'i 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba'i sems can rjes su gzung ba'i phyir /
translated: now, in order to take care of those sentient beings to be guided by the Action maṇḍala of the Three-World-Wheel, which is the chief of the Action seals,

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos te /
translated: it says “Then the Bhagavān,” and so on.

original: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba'i sgra ni de ma thag pa ste /
translated: The word “then” means immediately,

original: dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: meaning “after the first-stage union samādhi.”

original: 'dir dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa nyid gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir dang por sbyor ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa nyid gzung bar bya'o //

original: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni rnam par snang mdzad do //
translated: “Bhagavān” is Vairocana.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos pas na yang zhes bya'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor la ltos pas na yang zhes bya'o //

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni las kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni las kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //

original: 'di'i dam tshig ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid do //
analyzed: 'di'i dam tshig ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid do //
translated: His pledge is this very maṇḍala of the action of the Three Worlds.

original: de las byung ba ni skyes pa ste /
analyzed: de las byung ba ni skyes pa ste /
translated: Arisen from that is born.🔽The five-pronged vajra blazing forth from the heart of Vajra Hūṃkāra

analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi thugs la gnas @2a * //
translated: is the pledge seal of Vajra Dharma.🔽The samādhi that is blessed by that, made firm, is called that.🔽Having entered into equipoise on that,🔽in order to emanate the maṇḍala of the action of the Three Worlds,

original: phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kar gnas pa'i rdo rje brtan par byed pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kar gnas pa'i rdo rje brtan par byed pa'i rnam par thugs rtse gcig tu mdzad ces bya ba'i don to //
translated: The meaning is that he focused his mind one-pointedly on the vajra that is located at Vajrapāṇi’s heart, in order to stabilize it.

original: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pa ste /
analyzed: 'di zhes bya ba ni blo la gnas pa ste /
translated: “This” means that which is located in the mind.

original: bdag nyid rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa ni bshad pa'o //
analyzed: bdag nyid rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs pa ni bshad pa'o //
translated: He spoke of this, his own sublime awareness, which is explained as follows.

original: aom badzra karma pra brta ni sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba 'di ni /
analyzed: aom badzra karma pra brta ni sa ma ye h'um zhes bya ba 'di ni /
translated: Oṃ vajra karma pravarta ni samayê hūṃ.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa nyid kyis rig pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu gyur pas na rig pa dam pa'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo thams cad kyi las kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i rgyur gyur pa nyid kyis rig pa thams cad kyi nang na mchog tu gyur pas na rig pa dam pa'o //
translated: This is the sublime awareness, because it is the supreme among all awarenesses, since it is the cause for generating the karma maṇḍala of all the wheels of the three worlds.

original: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
analyzed: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje zhes bya ba nas brtsams te /
translated: Then, the bodhisattva mahāsattva Vajrapāṇi, and so on, up to

original: rdo rje bran mo rnams kyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar du bstan pa ni go sla'o //
analyzed: rdo rje bran mo rnams kyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar du bstan pa ni go sla'o //
translated: the vajra female servants.

original: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas bran mo rnams kyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar du bstan pa'i gzhung 'dis ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa @2b🔽gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas yang bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba nas brtsams nas bran mo rnams kyi'o zhes bya ba'i bar du bstan pa'i gzhung 'dis ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gnyis pa @2b gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Then, beginning with “Then the Blessed One…” up to “the female servants,” this text teaches the second samādhi called “the supreme king of maṇḍalas” of the Maṇḍala of Action of the Wheel of the Three Realms.

original: de nas bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de nas bsdu ba dang byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa bstan pa ni /
translated: Then, the teaching on the gathering, consecration, and so forth,

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gsum pa yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: should be known as the third samādhi called “the supreme king of actions” of the Maṇḍala of Action of the Wheel of the Three Realms.

original: 'jig rten gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis de las gsungs pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'jig rten gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du dam tshig dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams kyis de las gsungs pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par bya'o zhes bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: In order to teach that those who have obtained the commitments and empowerment in the Maṇḍala of Action of the Wheel of the Three Realms should accomplish the feats taught in that [tantra],🔽[the Bhagavān] declares,

original: de nas phyag na rdo rjes zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang / slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
analyzed: de nas phyag na rdo rjes zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi las kyi cho ga dang / slob ma 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par gsungs pa yin no //
translated: Then, the ritual of the master's acts for the karma mandala of the Wheel of the Three Worlds, and the extensive ritual for inducting the disciples, are taught, beginning with Then, Vajrapani...

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab pa'o //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni skabs su bab pa'o //
translated: Then means at that time.

original: phyag na rdo rje ni rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
analyzed: phyag na rdo rje ni rdo rje h'um mdzad do //
translated: Vajrapani is Vajra Humkara.

original: yang zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'khor lo la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: yang zhes bya ba ni chos kyi 'khor lo la ltos pa'o //
translated: Again refers to the Dharma wheel.

original: rdo rje'i rigs thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so //
analyzed: rdo rje'i rigs thams cad ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so //
translated: All the vajra clans are the mundane and supramundane karma mandalas.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni de ma thag pa ste /
translated: Then means immediately after.

original: sngar bsnyen pa byas pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: sngar bsnyen pa byas pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: After previously performing the service means immediately after.

original: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: The meaning of this is taught as follows.

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor dang / de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i cho gas dpal rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor dang / de las bshad pa'i rnal 'byor chen po byas la /
translated: Having performed the yoga of glorious Vajrahūṃkāra according to the rite explained in the Great Mandala of the Triple World Victorious, and having performed the great yoga explained therein,

original: de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i rig pa rnams re re zhing yang bzlas pa khri bya'o //
analyzed: de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i rig pa rnams re re zhing yang bzlas pa khri bya'o //
translated: then one should perform ten thousand recitations of each of the vidyās taught in the Action Mandala of the Triple World Wheel.

original: de ltar byas na sngon du bsnyen par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar byas na sngon du bsnyen par 'gyur ro //
translated: If one does it in that way, it becomes the prior approximation.

original: de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i ting de 'dzin gsum bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas zhag bdun bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du gsungs pa'i ting de 'dzin gsum bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas zhag bdun bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Then, having gone through the prior meditation of the three samadhis taught in the Action Mandala of the Triple World Wheel, one should meditate for seven days.

original: de nas de'i rjes thogs nyid la dkyil 'khor bri ba'am /
analyzed: de nas de'i rjes thogs nyid la dkyil 'khor bri ba'am /
translated: Then, immediately after that, one should draw the mandala.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las gsungs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam pa gsum bsgom pa sngon du 'gro bas 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor zla ba gcig gam zla ba drug gam /
translated: Having first cultivated the three meditative stabilizations that are taught in the Action Maṇḍala of the Three Worlds’ Wheel, one should perform the Action Maṇḍala of the Three Worlds’ Wheel for one month or six months.🔽

original: lo gcig gi bar du bsgoms la ji srid mngon sum du gyur la de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
analyzed: lo gcig gi bar du bsgoms la ji srid mngon sum du gyur la de srid kyi bar du bsgom par bya'o //
translated: Having first cultivated the three kinds of meditative concentration taught in the Three Worlds Wheel Ritual Mandala, one should meditate on the Three Worlds Wheel Ritual Mandala for one month, or six months, or one year, until one has actually seen it.

original: de nas de'i rjes pa dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de'i rjes pa dkyil 'khor 'di bri bar bya'o //
translated: Then, after that, one should draw this mandala.

original: de nas zhes bya ba ni rgyu de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to //🔽gang gi phyir 'jig rten @3a * //
analyzed: de nas zhes bya ba ni rgyu de'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don to // gang gi phyir 'jig rten @3a * //
translated: “ Then” means “for that reason.”

original: gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med na /
analyzed: gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa med na /
translated: Because without entering the Three Worlds Wheel Ritual Mandala,

original: des 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams rnams kyi 'dod pa'i don gyi dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir /
analyzed: des 'dul ba'i sems can gyi khams rnams kyi 'dod pa'i don gyi dngos grub tu mi 'gyur ba de'i phyir /
translated: the realm of sentient beings to be trained will not attain the desired spiritual powers,

original: rab tu bshad par bya zhing rnam par dbye bar bya'o //
analyzed: rab tu bshad par bya zhing rnam par dbye bar bya'o //
translated: therefore, “I will explain it and analyze it.”

original: las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
analyzed: las kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste //
translated: It is the supreme ritual mandala.

original: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni //
translated: By the method of the vajra maṇḍala,

original: dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bus bre //
translated: all maṇḍalas are measured with a string.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the meaning:

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro //
translated: The maṇḍala of the Dhāraṇī of the Wheel of the Three Worlds is the vajra maṇḍala.

original: 'dir de'i tshul gyis las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di thams cad srad bus bre bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir de'i tshul gyis las kyi dkyil 'khor 'di thams cad srad bus bre bar bya'o //
translated: By the method of that, all of this maṇḍala of action is measured with a string.

original: de 'dir bstan pa ni /
analyzed: de 'dir bstan pa ni /
translated: Here it is taught:

original: grva bzhi pa la byang phyogs sgo //
analyzed: grva bzhi pa la byang phyogs sgo //
translated: The northern gate is in the four corners,

original: phyi rol dkyil 'khor srad bus bre //
analyzed: phyi rol dkyil 'khor srad bus bre //
translated: the outer maṇḍala is measured with a string.

original: de yi nang du der yang ni //
analyzed: de yi nang du der yang ni //
translated: In the middle of that,

original: de bzhin sgo ni shar phyogs gdod //
analyzed: de bzhin sgo ni shar phyogs gdod //
translated: the eastern gate is in the same way.

original: ces bya ba gsungs so //
analyzed: ces bya ba gsungs so //
translated: This is taught.

original: dkyil 'khor mchog gi gnas su phyogs bzhi'i dbus kyi cha thams cad du sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs par bya /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor mchog gi gnas su phyogs bzhi'i dbus kyi cha thams cad du sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs par bya /
translated: In the middle of the supreme maṇḍala, the Buddhas should be placed in the middle of all the parts of the four directions.

original: zhes bya ba ni ;
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni ;
translated: This is the meaning:

original: sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs pa rnams ni sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs pa ste /
analyzed: sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs pa rnams ni sangs rgyas dbus na bzhugs pa ste /
translated: The Buddhas in the middle are the Buddhas in the middle.

original: dkyil 'khor gyi mchog go //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gyi mchog go //
translated: The supreme maṇḍala.

original: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad dang / rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi h'um mdzad nyid sangs rgyas su 'dod kyi /
analyzed: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad dang / rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi h'um mdzad nyid sangs rgyas su 'dod kyi /
translated: In this, one should assert that Vajra Hūṃkara, Ratna Hūṃkara, Dharma Hūṃkara, and Karma Hūṃkara are the Buddhas.

original: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad la sogs pa ni ma yin te /
translated: But not Vairocana, etc.

original: gang gi phyir 'dir rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dir rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are located in the form of Vajra Hūṃkara, etc.

original: de dag gis ni zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag gis ni zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “By them” means

original: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i rang rang gi phyogs gnyis kar rim pa bzhin du bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi'i rang rang gi phyogs gnyis kar rim pa bzhin du bya'o //
translated: by the four Tathāgatas, each in their own direction, in order.

original: yang gi sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste rim pa nyid do //
analyzed: yang gi sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste rim pa nyid do //
translated: The word “also” is for emphasis, meaning “just in order.”

original: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag ces bya ba ni /
analyzed: sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag ces bya ba ni /
translated: “The great beings” means

original: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas /
translated: Vajra Heruka, etc.,

original: khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyi bar du bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyi bar du bri bar bya'o //
translated: up to and including Vajra Muṣṭi.

original: de'i zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de'i zhes bya ba ni /
translated: “In that” means

original: bshad ma thag pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor de'i'o //
analyzed: bshad ma thag pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor de'i'o //
translated: in that maṇḍala that has just been explained.

original: dbus ni nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phyogs su'o //
analyzed: dbus ni nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi lte ba'i phyogs su'o //
translated: “In the center” means in the center of the inner maṇḍala.

original: rdo rje rig pa dam pa chung ma dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi'o //
analyzed: rdo rje rig pa dam pa chung ma dang bcas pa dang / rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi'o //
translated: Vajravidya, the excellent one, with his wife, and the four secret offerings of Vajralilā, and so forth.

original: de yi lha mo go rims bzhin //
analyzed: de yi lha mo go rims bzhin //
translated: Their goddesses, in order,

original: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du //
analyzed: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor tshul bzhin du //
translated: in the manner of the vajra maṇḍala.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is saying:

original: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi go rims bzhin rdo rje gser la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis rim @3b pa bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi go rims bzhin rdo rje gser la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis rim @3b pa bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the order of the inner maṇḍala, the goddesses of Vajraratna, and so forth, should be drawn in the order of the maṇḍala of the Dhāraṇī of the Wheel of the Three Realms.

original: ji lta bur gyur pa zhig bri bar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta bur gyur pa zhig bri bar bya zhe na /
translated: In what way should they be drawn?

original: rang gi phyag rgya phyag rgya 'dra //
analyzed: rang gi phyag rgya phyag rgya 'dra //
translated: Their own mudrā, like a mudrā,

original: gar byed pa ni bri bar bya //
analyzed: gar byed pa ni bri bar bya //
translated: dancing, should be drawn.

original: zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is saying:

original: de la rdo rje gser dang / rdo rje gzhon nu ma dang / rdo rje zhi ba mo dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje bdud rtsi dang / rdo rje mda' dang / rdo rje dbyug pa dang / rdo rje rked bcings dang /
analyzed: de la rdo rje gser dang / rdo rje gzhon nu ma dang / rdo rje zhi ba mo dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / rdo rje bdud rtsi dang / rdo rje mda' dang / rdo rje dbyug pa dang / rdo rje rked bcings dang /
translated: There, Vajraratna, Vajrakumārī, Vajraśānti, Vajramuṣṭi, Vajrasadhu, Vajrāṅkuśī, Vajraśṛṅkhalā, Vajrapāśī, Vajraghantā, and Vajralāsī should be drawn in the manner of the maṇḍala of the Dhāraṇī of the Wheel of the Three Realms.

original: rdo rje 'ju ma dang / rdo rje zab mo rnams kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni de'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'ju ma dang / rdo rje zab mo rnams kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni de'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: The mudrā of Vajra-ju-ma and Vajra-zab-mo is the mudrā of the consort.

original: rdo rje chu srin ma dang / rdo rje rul pa mo dang / rdo rje dus dang / rdo rje kha dang / rdo rje 'khor ma dang / rdo rje 'bar ma dang / rdo rje mgyogs ma dang / rdo rje pho nya ma dang /
analyzed: rdo rje chu srin ma dang / rdo rje rul pa mo dang / rdo rje dus dang / rdo rje kha dang / rdo rje 'khor ma dang / rdo rje 'bar ma dang / rdo rje mgyogs ma dang / rdo rje pho nya ma dang /
translated: The mudrā of Vajra-makarī, Vajra-putrid, Vajra-time, Vajra-mouth, Vajra-wheel, Vajra-flame, Vajra-swift, Vajra-messenger,

original: rdo rje dbang mo dang / rdo rje sgo ba ma rnams kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni lan gyi phyag rgyar brjod do //
analyzed: rdo rje dbang mo dang / rdo rje sgo ba ma rnams kyi phyag rgya gang yin pa de ni lan gyi phyag rgyar brjod do //
translated: Vajra-powerful, and Vajra-door-woman is the mudrā of the reply.

original: lugs su byung ba dang / lugs las ba zlog pa'i tshul gyis phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan du shes par bya'o //
analyzed: lugs su byung ba dang / lugs las ba zlog pa'i tshul gyis phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan du shes par bya'o //
translated: The mudrā and the reply mudrā should be known in the forward and reverse orders.

original: de la rdo rje gser gyi gar gyi mchod pa byas la /
analyzed: de la rdo rje gser gyi gar gyi mchod pa byas la /
translated: There, having made the offering dance of Vajra-gold,

original: rdo rje chu srin gyi gar gyi mchod bas phyag rgya'i lan bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chu srin gyi gar gyi mchod bas phyag rgya'i lan bya'o //
translated: one should make the reply mudrā of the dance offering of Vajra-makarī.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje za ba'i gar gyi mchod pa bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje za ba'i gar gyi mchod pa bya ste /
translated: Likewise, one should make the offering dance of Vajra-eating,🔽and the reply mudrā of the dance offering of Vajra-putrid.

original: rdo rje sgo ba ma'i gar gyi mchod pas phyag rgya'i lan gyi bar du bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje sgo ba ma'i gar gyi mchod pas phyag rgya'i lan gyi bar du bya'o //
translated: One should do this up to the reply of the consort with the dance offering of the vajra door-keepers.

original: de ltar rang gi phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya'i lan gyis gar byed ba'i tshus kyis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar rang gi phyag rgya dang / phyag rgya'i lan gyis gar byed ba'i tshus kyis bri bar bya'o //
translated: Thus, one should draw the dance of one's own consort and the dance of the reply of the consort.

original: ci'i phyir de ltar bri bar bya zhe na /🔽sangs rgyas rdo rje can mchod phyir //
analyzed: ci'i phyir de ltar bri bar bya zhe na / sangs rgyas rdo rje can mchod phyir //
translated: Why should one draw in this way?

original: zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: It is said, In order to worship the vajra-holders, the buddhas.

original: ji ltar bya zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar bya zhe na /
translated: How should one do it?

original: rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis so //🔽zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: rdo rje gar gyi tshul gyis so // zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said, In the manner of vajra dance.

original: gar byed pa'i tshul du bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: gar byed pa'i tshul du bri bar bya'o //
translated: One should draw in the manner of dancing.

original: de ltar rdo rje gar byed pa'i tshul gyis glog 'gyur ba lta bu mdun du bskor pa 'di ni rdo rje gar byed pa zhes grags so //
analyzed: de ltar rdo rje gar byed pa'i tshul gyis glog 'gyur ba lta bu mdun du bskor pa 'di ni rdo rje gar byed pa zhes grags so //
translated: Thus, this circling in front like a flash of lightning in the manner of the vajra dance is renowned as the vajra dance.

original: grva dang sgo'i phyogs rnams su 'dug pa la sogs pa rim pa bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: grva dang sgo'i phyogs rnams su 'dug pa la sogs pa rim pa bzhin zhes bya ba ni /
translated: As for sitting in the corners and door directions, etc. in order,

original: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi dang / nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgor rdo rje glang sna ma dang / phreng ba ma dang / phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgor rdo rje dbang dang /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i lha mo bzhi dang / nang gi dkyil 'khor gyi sgor rdo rje glang sna ma dang / phreng ba ma dang / phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sgor rdo rje dbang dang /
translated: The four goddesses such as Dhūmāṅgī are in the outer maṇḍala’s boundaries, and Vajrhagā, Māla, Vajravijayā, and Vajrarājā are at the doors of the inner maṇḍala and the outer maṇḍala, respectively.

original: rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje dag 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rim pa bzhin zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
analyzed: rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje dag 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i cho ga bzhin du bri bar bya'o zhes bya ba 'di ni rim pa bzhin zhes bya ba'i don yin no //
translated: They should be drawn according to the procedure explained in the Trilokavijaya Dhāraṇīmaṇḍala. This is the meaning of “in order.”

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.

original: sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / dkar po'i kha dog gis thig skud so sor kha bsgyur la /
analyzed: sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu dang / dkar po'i kha dog gis thig skud so sor kha bsgyur la /
translated: The cords should be dyed with the colors blue, yellow, red, green, and white, respectively.

original: @4a * // de nyid kyi rim pa bzhin bzhag la h'um tr'am hr'i: aa a'a zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa lnga'i sa bon gyi yi ge de rnams rang rang gi kha dog gi thig skud de rnams la rim pa bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i
analyzed: @4a * // de nyid kyi rim pa bzhin bzhag la h'um tr'am hr'i: aa a'a zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rnam pa lnga'i sa bon gyi yi ge de rnams rang rang gi kha dog gi thig skud de rnams la rim pa bzhin du mi bskyod pa la sogs pa'i
translated: Arrange the tathāgatas Akṣobhya and so on on the strings.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bkod la bar snang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa rnams las rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer dang yang 'bar ba'i lta bas blta zhing bkug la lag na gnas pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i thig skud de rnams bkang la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bkod la bar snang gi phyogs na bzhugs pa rnams las rang gi sa bon las byung ba'i 'od zer dang yang 'bar ba'i lta bas blta zhing bkug la lag na gnas pa'i sngon po la sogs pa'i thig skud de rnams bkang la /
translated: Looking with blazing light rays from one’s seed syllable in the space above, summon the tathāgatas, and fill the strings in one’s hands with the colors of blue and so on.🔽Recite:

original: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarbba dharmm'a sphar sphar aa nu pra bishta sarbba dharmm'a aa tya na ha aa nu pra bishta sarbba dharm'a /
analyzed: aa n+yo n+ya aa nu ga ta sarbba dharmm'a sphar sphar aa nu pra bishta sarbba dharmm'a aa tya na ha aa nu pra bishta sarbba dharm'a /
translated: “Anyonya anu gata sarva dharma sphara sphara anu pravistha sarva dharma atyana anu pravistha sarva dharma.

original: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um gri hna gri hna h'um /
analyzed: aom sumbha ni sumbha h'um gri hna gri hna h'um /
translated: Oṃ sumbha nisumbha hūṃ / gṛhṇa gṛhṇa hūṃ /

original: gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um /
analyzed: gri hn'a pa ya gri hn'a pa ya h'um /
translated: gṛhṇāpaya gṛhṇāpaya hūṃ /

original: a'a na ya ho /
analyzed: a'a na ya ho /
translated: ānayaho /

original: bha ga w'an badzra h'um phat /
analyzed: bha ga w'an badzra h'um phat /
translated: Bha gawän vajra hūṃ phaṭ.

original: ces bya bas bsgril bar bya'o //
analyzed: ces bya bas bsgril bar bya'o //
translated: Thus one should roll it.

original: de nas dris byugs la /
analyzed: de nas dris byugs la /
translated: Then, having anointed it,

original: gser la sogs pa'i snod du thig skud de bzhag la /
analyzed: gser la sogs pa'i snod du thig skud de bzhag la /
translated: one should place that thread in a vessel of gold, etc.,

original: me tog gtor ba dang / bdug pa phul la rdo rje bsdams pas bzung la ;
analyzed: me tog gtor ba dang / bdug pa phul la rdo rje bsdams pas bzung la ;
translated: scatter flowers, offer incense, and hold it with the vajra-bond.

original: aom badzra s'u tra a'a karsha ya sarbba mandala h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra s'u tra a'a karsha ya sarbba mandala h'um /
translated: Oṃ vajra-sūtra ākarṣaya sarva-maṇḍala hūṃ.

original: zhes bya ba des sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba des sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzla bar bya'o //
translated: With that mantra one should recite one hundred and eight times.

original: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad dang / rin chen dang / chos dang las kyi h'um mdzad kyang bzla bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad dang / rin chen dang / chos dang las kyi h'um mdzad kyang bzla bar bya'o //
translated: Then one should also recite the vajra-hūṃkāra, ratna-hūṃkāra, dharma-hūṃkāra, and karma-hūṃkāra.

original: de nas rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis thig skud de blangs la /
analyzed: de nas rim pa ji lta ba bzhin du g-yon pa'i khu tshur gyis thig skud de blangs la /
translated: Then, having taken that thread with the left fist in the proper order,

original: aom badzra s'u tra aa karsha ya sarbba mandala h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: aom badzra s'u tra aa karsha ya sarbba mandala h'um zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis dkyil 'khor thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: one should lay out the maṇḍala with this essence mantra, Oṃ vajra-sūtra ākarṣaya sarva-maṇḍala hūṃ.

original: dang por re zhig tshangs pa'i thig gnyis gdab ste //
analyzed: dang por re zhig tshangs pa'i thig gnyis gdab ste //
translated: First, one should lay out two Brahmā lines.

original: de nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa /
analyzed: de nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor zur bzhi pa /
translated: Then, the outer maṇḍala is a square,

original: byang phyogs su sgo btod pa thig btab la de'i nang du cha drug tu phye ba las dkyil 'khor gnyis pa cha bzhi pa sgo shar du btod ba'o //
analyzed: byang phyogs su sgo btod pa thig btab la de'i nang du cha drug tu phye ba las dkyil 'khor gnyis pa cha bzhi pa sgo shar du btod ba'o //
translated: with the door facing north. Having laid out the lines, in the center of that, having divided it into six parts, the second maṇḍala is a four-part maṇḍala with the door facing east.

original: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de'i dbus su de'i phyed kyi tshad rdo rje rig pa dam ba'i gnas thig gdab par bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa de'i dbus su de'i phyed kyi tshad rdo rje rig pa dam ba'i gnas thig gdab par bya'o //
translated: In the center of that second maṇḍala, the site of the vajra awareness beings is laid out with lines half that size.

original: de nas srad bu bres pa der dag pa'i tshon gyis dgang bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas srad bu bres pa der dag pa'i tshon gyis dgang bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having woven the lines, it is filled with pure colors.🔽The essence of the colors

original: tshon rtsi 'dri ba'i snying po dang / g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur ches //
analyzed: tshon rtsi 'dri ba'i snying po dang / g-yon pa'i rdo rje khu tshur ches //
translated: is held with the left vajra fist

original: cho ga bzhin du gzung bar bya //
analyzed: cho ga bzhin du gzung bar bya //
translated: in accordance with the rite.

original: dang po bris nas phyis ci bder //
analyzed: dang po bris nas phyis ci bder //
translated: Having drawn it first, later it is comfortable.

original: de la 'di ni tshon gyi snying po yin te /
analyzed: de la 'di ni tshon gyi snying po yin te /
translated: The essence of the colors is as follows:

original: aom badzra r'a ka sa ma ya h'um /
analyzed: aom badzra r'a ka sa ma ya h'um /
translated: oṃ vajra rakhasaṃ hūṃ.

original: tshon rtsi 'dri ba ni tshon rtsi dkar po la yi ge aa las /
analyzed: tshon rtsi 'dri ba ni tshon rtsi dkar po la yi ge aa las /
translated: The colors are drawn with white color from the syllable aḥ.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs brnyan dkar po dang / sdon po la yi ge h'um las de bzhin @4b gshegs pa mi bskyod pa'i gzugs brnyan sngon po dang / ser po la yi ge hr'am las de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gzugs brnyan ser po dang /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi gzugs brnyan dkar po dang / sdon po la yi ge h'um las de bzhin @4b gshegs pa mi bskyod pa'i gzugs brnyan sngon po dang / ser po la yi ge hr'am las de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan gyi gzugs brnyan ser po dang /
translated: Likewise, from the white or yellow image of the Tathagata Vairocana, the blue image of the Tathagata Akshobhya arises from the syllable hum.

original: dmar po la yi ge hr'i: las de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi gzugs brnyan dmar bo /🔽ljang gu la yi ge aa las /
analyzed: dmar po la yi ge hr'i: las de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi gzugs brnyan dmar bo / ljang gu la yi ge aa las /
translated: From the yellow image of the Tathagata Ratnasambhava arises the red image of the Tathagata Amitabha from the syllable hrih.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa'i gzugs brnyan ljang gu bskyed la /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa don yod grub pa'i gzugs brnyan ljang gu bskyed la /
translated: From the green image of the Tathagata Amoghasiddhi arises the green image of the Tathagata Amoghasiddhi from the syllable ah.

original: sngar bshad ba'i tshon rtsi byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya dang / aom badzra r'a ka sa ma ya h'um /
analyzed: sngar bshad ba'i tshon rtsi byin gyis brlab pa'i phyag rgya dang / aom badzra r'a ka sa ma ya h'um /
translated: Then, with the mudra of consecrating the colors explained above, and the mantra Om vajra rakhasa maya hum,

original: zhes bya pa 'di re re zhing lan bdun bdun bzlas par bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya pa 'di re re zhing lan bdun bdun bzlas par bya'o //
translated: each one should be repeated seven times.

original: de la dang por sngon po dang / de nas ser po dang / de nas dmar po dang / de nas ljang gu dang / de nas thams cad kyi nang du dkar pos dkyil 'khor gnyis tshon sna ldas bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de la dang por sngon po dang / de nas ser po dang / de nas dmar po dang / de nas ljang gu dang / de nas thams cad kyi nang du dkar pos dkyil 'khor gnyis tshon sna ldas bri bar bya'o //
translated: First, one should draw blue, then yellow, then red, then green, and then white in the middle of all of them.

original: de ltar 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang / gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la yang shes par bya'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang / gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la yang shes par bya'o //
translated: One should know that the great maṇḍala of the Wheel of the Three Worlds and the maṇḍala of dhāraṇī are also like this.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris la /
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris la /
translated: Having drawn the maṇḍala in this way,

original: dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i dbus su /
analyzed: dkyil 'khor dbus ma'i dbus su /
translated: in the center of the central maṇḍala,

original: rdo rje rig pa dam pa rang gi chung ma dang bcas pa gar byed pa'i sbyor bas gnas pa bri bar bya'o //🔽dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi shar lho'i mtshams kyi cha la sgeg mo /
analyzed: rdo rje rig pa dam pa rang gi chung ma dang bcas pa gar byed pa'i sbyor bas gnas pa bri bar bya'o // dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi shar lho'i mtshams kyi cha la sgeg mo /
translated: one should draw the sublime knowledge vajra together with one’s consort, abiding in the union of dance.🔽In the southeast corner of that maṇḍala, one should draw the goddess Lāsyā;

original: lho nub kyi mtshams su phreng ba ma /🔽nub byang gi mtshams su glu ma /
analyzed: lho nub kyi mtshams su phreng ba ma / nub byang gi mtshams su glu ma /
translated: in the southwest corner, the goddess Mālā;🔽in the northwest corner, the goddess Gītā;

original: byang shar gyi mtshams su gar ma bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: byang shar gyi mtshams su gar ma bri bar bya'o //
translated: and in the northeast corner, the goddess Nrtyā.

original: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i shar phyogs kyi lha'i snam bu'i dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba bri ba dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang gi phyogs su yang bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i shar phyogs kyi lha'i snam bu'i dbus su rdo rje rtse lnga pa 'bar ba bri ba dang / de bzhin du lho phyogs dang / nub phyogs dang / byang gi phyogs su yang bri bar bya'o //
translated: and likewise in the south,🔽west, and north.

original: de nas shar phyogs kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i byang gi cha la rdo rje gser dang / rdo rje gzhon nu ma gnyis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas shar phyogs kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i byang gi cha la rdo rje gser dang / rdo rje gzhon nu ma gnyis bri bar bya'o //
translated: Then, in the northern part of the eastern vajra-seal, one should draw the vajra-gold and the vajra-maiden.

original: rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi lho phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje zhi ba dang / rdo rje khu tshur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi lho phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje zhi ba dang / rdo rje khu tshur ro //
translated: In the southern part of that very vajra-seal, one should draw the vajra-peace and the vajra-fist.

original: lho phyogs kyi rdo rje phyag rgya'i shar phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje bdud rtsi dang / rdo rje 'od do //
analyzed: lho phyogs kyi rdo rje phyag rgya'i shar phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje bdud rtsi dang / rdo rje 'od do //
translated: In the eastern part of the southern vajra-seal, one should draw the vajra-ambrosia and the vajra-light.

original: rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi nub phyogs kyi cha la /
analyzed: rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi nub phyogs kyi cha la /
translated: In the western part of that very vajra-seal,

original: rdo rje dbyig pa dang / rdo rje rked bcings ma'o ;
analyzed: rdo rje dbyig pa dang / rdo rje rked bcings ma'o ;
translated: one should draw the vajra-cudgel and the vajra-girdle.

original: / nub phyogs kyi rdo rje phyag rgya'i lho phyogs kyi cha la /
analyzed: / nub phyogs kyi rdo rje phyag rgya'i lho phyogs kyi cha la /
translated: In the southern part of the western vajra-seal,🔽one should draw the vajra-hook and the vajra-noose.

original: rdo rje pho nya ma dang / rdo rje mgyogs ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje pho nya ma dang / rdo rje mgyogs ma'o //
translated: Vajra Messenger and Vajra Swift One.

original: rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi byang phyogs kyi cha la /
analyzed: rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi byang phyogs kyi cha la /
translated: In the northern part of that very vajra mudra,

original: rdo rje 'bar ba dang / rdo rje 'khyor ma'o //
analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ba dang / rdo rje 'khyor ma'o //
translated: Vajra Blazing and Vajra Carrying.

original: byang phyogs kyi rdo rje nub phyogs kyi cha la /
analyzed: byang phyogs kyi rdo rje nub phyogs kyi cha la /
translated: In the northern vajra, in the western part,

original: rdo rje kha dang / rdo rje dus so //
analyzed: rdo rje kha dang / rdo rje dus so //
translated: Vajra Mouth and Vajra Time.

original: rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi shar @5a * //
analyzed: rdo rje'i phyag rgya de nyid kyi shar @5a * //
translated: In the eastern part of that very vajra mudra,

original: phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje rul pa mo dang / rdo rje chu srin mo bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyogs kyi cha la rdo rje rul pa mo dang / rdo rje chu srin mo bri bar bya'o //
translated: Vajra Rotten and Vajra Crocodile should be drawn.

original: de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa me'i mtshams kyi cha la 'jigs ma /
analyzed: de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor gnyis pa me'i mtshams kyi cha la 'jigs ma /
translated: In the second maṇḍala of that very [mudra], in the part of the fire direction, Vajra Fearful;

original: bden bral du dpal mo //
analyzed: bden bral du dpal mo //
translated: in the rakshasa direction, Vajra Glorious;

original: rlung du dbyangs can ma /
analyzed: rlung du dbyangs can ma /
translated: in the wind direction, Vajra Melodious;

original: dbang ldan du dka' bzlog ma bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbang ldan du dka' bzlog ma bri bar bya'o //
translated: and in the northeast, Vajra Difficult to Conquer should be drawn.

original: dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje 'ju ma dang / rdo rje za ba ma'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje 'ju ma dang / rdo rje za ba ma'o //
translated: In the middle of the door of that very maṇḍala, Vajra Sucking and Vajra Eating.

original: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu'i shar phyogs kyi dbus kyi cha la rdo rje h'um mdzad /
analyzed: phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i snam bu'i shar phyogs kyi dbus kyi cha la rdo rje h'um mdzad /
translated: In the eastern part of the outer maṇḍala deity's platform, Vajra Hūṃkāra;

original: de'i byang phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' dang / khro bo rdo rje rgyal po'o //
analyzed: de'i byang phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' dang / khro bo rdo rje rgyal po'o //
translated: On the northern side of that [circle] are the wrathful Vajrasattva and the wrathful Vajrarāja.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad de nyid kyi lho phyogs kyi cha la khro bo rdo rje chags pa dang / khro bo rdo rje legs pa bri'o //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad de nyid kyi lho phyogs kyi cha la khro bo rdo rje chags pa dang / khro bo rdo rje legs pa bri'o //
translated: To the south of that very Vajrahūṃkāra, draw the wrathful Vajrarāga and the wrathful Vajrasaṃbhava.

original: dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi lho phyogs kyi cha la rin chen h'um mdzad dang / de'i shar phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje rin chen dang / khro bo rdo rje nyi ma'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi lho phyogs kyi cha la rin chen h'um mdzad dang / de'i shar phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje rin chen dang / khro bo rdo rje nyi ma'o //
translated: To the south of that very maṇḍala, draw Ratna-hūṃkāra, and to the east of him, the wrathful Vajraratna and the wrathful Vajrasūrya.

original: de nyid kyi nub phyogs kyi cha la khro bo rdo rje dpal dang / khro bo rdo rje bzhad pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid kyi nub phyogs kyi cha la khro bo rdo rje dpal dang / khro bo rdo rje bzhad pa'o //
translated: To the west of him [draw] the wrathful Vajraśrī and the wrathful Vajrahasita.

original: nub phyogs kyi lha'i snam bu'i dbus kyi cha la chos kyi h'um mdzad /
analyzed: nub phyogs kyi lha'i snam bu'i dbus kyi cha la chos kyi h'um mdzad /
translated: In the center of the western celestial mansion, draw Dharma-hūṃkāra.

original: de'i g-yas phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje chos dang / khro bo rdo rje rnon po'o //
analyzed: de'i g-yas phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje chos dang / khro bo rdo rje rnon po'o //
translated: To the right of him, draw the wrathful Vajradharma and the wrathful Vajratīkṣṇa.

original: de nyid g-yon phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje rgyu dang / khro bo rdo rje srung ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid g-yon phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje rgyu dang / khro bo rdo rje srung ba'o //
translated: On the left side of that [square] are the wrathful Vajrarāga and the wrathful Vajravarma.

original: de'i byang phyogs kyi lha'i snam bu'i dbus kyi cha la las kyi h'um mdzad /🔽de'i g-yas phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje las dang / khro bo rdo rje srung ba'o //
analyzed: de'i byang phyogs kyi lha'i snam bu'i dbus kyi cha la las kyi h'um mdzad / de'i g-yas phyogs kyi logs su khro bo rdo rje las dang / khro bo rdo rje srung ba'o //
translated: In the center of the celestial mansion in the north is Karmahūṃkāra.🔽On the right side of that [square] are the wrathful Vajrakarma and the wrathful Vajravarma.

original: de'i g-yon phyogs kyi cha la khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / khro bo rdo rje khu tshur bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i g-yon phyogs kyi cha la khro bo rdo rje gnod sbyin dang / khro bo rdo rje khu tshur bri bar bya'o //
translated: On the left side of that [square] are the wrathful Vajrayakṣa and the wrathful Vajramuṣṭi.

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi me'i mtshams kyi cha la /🔽rdo rje bdug pa ma dang / 'jigs ma'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o //🔽bden bral du rdo rje me tog ma dang / lha mo dpal mo'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor de nyid kyi me'i mtshams kyi cha la / rdo rje bdug pa ma dang / 'jigs ma'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o // bden bral du rdo rje me tog ma dang / lha mo dpal mo'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: In the southeast corner of that outer maṇḍala,🔽draw the vajra incense lady and the sign mudra of Abhayā.🔽In the southwest, draw the vajra flower lady and the sign mudra of Śrīdevī.

original: rlung du rdo rje mar me dang / dbyangs can ma'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rlung du rdo rje mar me dang / dbyangs can ma'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: In the northwest, draw the vajra lamp lady and the sign mudra of Sarasvatī.

original: dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi cha la rdo rje dri ma dang / dka' bzlog ma'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: dbang ldan gyi mtshams kyi cha la rdo rje dri ma dang / dka' bzlog ma'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the northeast corner, one should draw the seal-diagram of Vajra-smeller, and in the southeast corner, the seal-diagram of Vajra-maker.

original: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje sgo ba ma dang / rdo rje dbang mo dag bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi sgo'i dbus su rdo rje sgo ba ma dang / rdo rje dbang mo dag bri bar bya'o //
translated: In the center of the door of the outer maṇḍala, one should draw Vajra-door-lady and Vajra-power-lady.

original: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad dang / rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi h'um mdzad ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po /
analyzed: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad dang / rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi h'um mdzad ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po /
translated: There, the great seals of Vajra-hūṃkara, Ratna-hūṃkara, Dharma-hūṃkara, and Karma-hūṃkara are as explained in the great maṇḍala of the Wheel of the Three Realms.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor las @5b bshad pa'i rig pa rnams kyis bri bar bya'o //🔽khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor las @5b bshad pa'i rig pa rnams kyis bri bar bya'o // khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa nas /
translated: One should draw them with the awarenesses explained in the Dharma maṇḍala of the Wheel of the Three Realms.🔽One should draw the wrathful ones, beginning with Vajra-Sattva,

original: rdo rje dril bu'i mthar thug pa bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu'i mthar thug pa bri bar bya'o //
translated: up to Vajra-ghantā.

original: sgeg mo la sogs pa ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam pa rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i sngags kyis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: sgeg mo la sogs pa ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam pa rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i sngags kyis bri bar bya'o //
translated: The goddesses beginning with Lāsyā should be written with the mantras of the great seals as explained in the great maṇḍala of the total victory in the three worlds.

original: rdo rje rig pa mchog la sogs pa nas rdo rje chu srin gyi mthar thug pa ni /
analyzed: rdo rje rig pa mchog la sogs pa nas rdo rje chu srin gyi mthar thug pa ni /
translated: The knowledge-mantras beginning with Vajravidyottama and ending with Vajrāṣṭā should be written

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i rig pa rnams kyis bri bar bya'o //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du bshad pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i rig pa rnams kyis bri bar bya'o //
translated: with the knowledge-mantras of the great seals as explained in the maṇḍala of the activity of the wheel of the three worlds.

original: 'jigs ma la sogs pa'i //
analyzed: 'jigs ma la sogs pa'i //
translated: The knowledge-mantras of the mātṛkās beginning with Bhayatrāṭ

original: aom sarbba badzra ga mi ni sarbba ba kshe s'a dha ya gu hya badzri ni h'um zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: aom sarbba badzra ga mi ni sarbba ba kshe s'a dha ya gu hya badzri ni h'um zhes bya ba ni /
translated: are written with the mantra Oṃ sarva-vajrāṅkuśaya sarva-vajrākarṣaya guhya-vajriṇi hūṃ.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i ma mo thams cad kyi spyi'i rig pa yin no //
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i ma mo thams cad kyi spyi'i rig pa yin no //
translated: This is the general knowledge-mantra of all the mātṛkās as explained in the maṇḍala of the dhāraṇīs of the wheel of the three worlds.

original: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas /🔽rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas / rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi rnal 'byor pas //
translated: Having drawn the maṇḍala in this way,🔽the vajra yogin of Vajrahūṃkāra🔽should bind the mudrā of Krodha Tīrṇāṭīrṇa

original: khro bo ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
analyzed: khro bo ti r'i nti ri'i phyag rgya bcings nas /
translated: and recite the mantra.

original: des me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
analyzed: des me tog gi phreng ba blangs te /
translated: He should take the flower garland,

original: rdo rje shugs kyis zhugs la /
analyzed: rdo rje shugs kyis zhugs la /
translated: enter with the vajra stride,

original: h'um bzhi brjod cing dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas lan bdun bskor ba byas te /
analyzed: h'um bzhi brjod cing dkyil 'khor du zhugs nas lan bdun bskor ba byas te /
translated: enter the maṇḍala, recite the four hūṃs, circumambulate the maṇḍala seven times,

original: lhag pa dang ma tshang ba'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: lhag pa dang ma tshang ba'i nyes pa zhi bar bya ba'i phyir /
translated: and in order to pacify the faults of excess and deficiency,

original: rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing blta bar bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje dril bu dkrol zhing blta bar bya'o //
translated: he should look at the maṇḍala while playing the vajra and bell.

original: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad la me tog gi phreng ba phul nas gar byas te blangs la rang gi spyi bor bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad la me tog gi phreng ba phul nas gar byas te blangs la rang gi spyi bor bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having offered the flower garland to the Blessed Vajrahūṃkara, he should take it up, dance, and tie it on his own head.

original: de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo gnyis ka dbye bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i sgo dbye ba'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor gyi sgo gnyis ka dbye bar bya'o //
translated: Then, with the mudra for opening the door as explained in the maṇḍala of Tripiṭaka Trailokyavijaya, he should open both doors of the maṇḍala.

original: snying po ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: snying po ni 'di yin te /
translated: The essence [mantra] is:

original: aom badzra autgha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha sh'i ghram sma ra badzra sa ma ya h'um phat /
analyzed: aom badzra autgha ta ya sa ma ya pra be sha sh'i ghram sma ra badzra sa ma ya h'um phat /
translated: oṃ vajra utthāya samaya praveśaya śṛṅkhalasmara vajra samaya hūṃ phaṭ.

original: de nas bum pa gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
analyzed: de nas bum pa gzhug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rjes su spyad nas /
translated: Then, having performed the rite of the introduction of the vase, and so on,🔽the master should perform the rite of his own initiation, up to the Observance of the Vajra-Conduct for Attaining Power, and the rite of the initiation of the disciples, and so on.

original: slob dpon gyis dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa'i rang nyid 'jug pa'i cho ga dang / slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'i tshul du rjes su spyad pas de nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te ;
analyzed: slob dpon gyis dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi mthar thug pa'i rang nyid 'jug pa'i cho ga dang / slob ma 'jug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga'i tshul du rjes su spyad pas de nas bdag la byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas te ;
translated: Then, having performed the Self-Consecration, and so on, just as before,

original: dkyil 'khor rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
analyzed: dkyil 'khor rdo rjes bsgrub par bya'o //
translated: one should accomplish the mandala with the Vajra.

original: de nas bsdu ba byas la /
analyzed: de nas bsdu ba byas la /
translated: Then, having gathered it up,

original: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad la bstod par bya'o //🔽de nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las bshad pa'i rdo rje h'um mdzad kyi mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje h'um mdzad la bstod par bya'o // de nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: one should praise the Blessed Vajra Hūṃkara with the one hundred and eight names from the Great Maṇḍala of the Conqueror of the Three Worlds.🔽Then means

original: de ma thag pa ste /
analyzed: de ma thag pa ste /
translated: immediately after,

original: @6a * // mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: @6a * // mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pas bstod pa'i rjes thogs la zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: the meaning is that it is immediately after the praise with the one hundred and eight names.

original: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i las byas nas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i las byas nas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Having performed the action of summoning and so forth in this mandala of action of the wheel of the three worlds,

original: de la 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas dgug pa'i las ni //
analyzed: de la 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas dgug pa'i las ni //
translated: the action of summoning by the action seal of the wrathful vajra hook explained in the Wheel of the Three Worlds Dharani Mandala

original: de nyid dang por byas pa'i dgug pa la sogs pa las gang yin pa de byed pa'o //
analyzed: de nyid dang por byas pa'i dgug pa la sogs pa las gang yin pa de byed pa'o //
translated: is the first of those actions of summoning and so forth.

original: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
analyzed: 'di skad ston pa yin te /
translated: This is what is being taught.🔽The action of summoning Vajra Humkara and so forth by the action seal of the wrathful vajra hook explained above,

original: ji skad bshad pa'i khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa dgug pa dang / de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang /
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa'i khro bo rdo rje lcags kyu'i las kyi phyag rgyas rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa dgug pa dang / de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal pa'i 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i zhags pa'i phyag rgyas dkyil 'khor du gzhug pa dang /
translated: then the action of inducting them into the mandala by the lasso seal explained in the Wheel of the Three Worlds Dharani Mandala,

original: lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas bcing ba dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i khro po rdo rje 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas dbang du bya'o //
analyzed: lcags sgrog gi phyag rgyas bcing ba dang / 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i khro po rdo rje 'bebs pa'i las kyi phyag rgyas dbang du bya'o //
translated: One should bind with the mudra of the iron chain, and subjugate with the wrathful vajra-summoning mudra of the mandala of the dhâranî of the Wheel of the Three Worlds.

original: de nas khro bo rdo rje gnod spyin gyis bgegs bskrad la /
analyzed: de nas khro bo rdo rje gnod spyin gyis bgegs bskrad la /
translated: Then, one should expel the obstructors with the wrathful vajra-yaksha.

original: khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad nas /
analyzed: khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyis sgo bcad nas /
translated: Having closed the door with the wrathful vajra-fist,

original: khro bo rdo rje go chas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrung bar bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo rdo rje go chas bsrung ba thams cad yang dag par bsrung bar bya'o //
translated: one should guard all the guards with the wrathful vajra-armor.

original: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis mchod yon phul la /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje h'um mdzad kyis mchod yon phul la /
translated: Then, having offered water for welcoming with the vajra-humkara,

original: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa thams cad snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs la /
analyzed: rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa thams cad snga ma bzhin du bsgrubs la /
translated: one should accomplish all, beginning with the vajra-humkara, with one's pledge seal, as before.

original: de nas chos dad las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgya btab ste /
analyzed: de nas chos dad las dang phyag rgya chen po rnams kyis rgya btab ste /
translated: Then, having sealed with the Dharma, action, and great pledge seals,

original: dbang bskur nas phyi rol gyi mchod pa dang rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad dang / rdo rje gser la sogs pa las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis las kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par mchod la /
analyzed: dbang bskur nas phyi rol gyi mchod pa dang rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa mchod pa rnam pa brgyad dang / rdo rje gser la sogs pa las kyi phyag rgya rnams kyis las kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag par mchod la /
translated: Having conferred initiation, he should worship the outer offerings and the eight offerings such as the Vajra Lady of Charm, and with the karmamudra such as the Vajra Lady of Gold, he should worship all the karma mandalas.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te /
translated: He should pay homage to all the Tathagatas,

original: slob ma gzhug pa'i gnang ba nod par bya'o //
analyzed: slob ma gzhug pa'i gnang ba nod par bya'o //
translated: and request permission to induct the disciples.

original: de nas snga ma bzhin du slob ma la phyag bzhi byed du bcug la /
analyzed: de nas snga ma bzhin du slob ma la phyag bzhi byed du bcug la /
translated: Then, as before, he should have the disciples perform four prostrations,

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad du byin gyis brlabs te /
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad du byin gyis brlabs te /
translated: and he should bless them as Vajra Humkara.

original: rdo rje h'um mdzad yongs su bzlas pa'i phyi rol na gnas pa'i chus dbang bskur ro //
analyzed: rdo rje h'um mdzad yongs su bzlas pa'i phyi rol na gnas pa'i chus dbang bskur ro //
translated: He should confer initiation with the water which remains outside, having been recited over with the Vajra Humkara mantra.

original: rdo rje 'chang pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bcings te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje 'chang pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bcings te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: He should bind the pledge seal of the karma of the Vajra Holder just as it is.

original: de ltar dbang bskur nas slob dpon rang nyid rdo rje 'chad pa'i sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can bcings la /
analyzed: de ltar dbang bskur nas slob dpon rang nyid rdo rje 'chad pa'i sngar bshad pa'i mtshan nyid can bcings la /
translated: Having conferred initiation in that way, the master himself binds the Vajra Holder as previously explained.

original: slob ma yang 'ching @6b du gzhug go //
analyzed: slob ma yang 'ching @6b du gzhug go //
translated: The disciples should also be bound under oath.

original: 'di'i snying po ni /
analyzed: 'di'i snying po ni /
translated: The essence mantra is:

original: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra dh'a ra gri hna sa ma ya h'um /
analyzed: aom sarbba ta th'a ga ta badzra dh'a ra gri hna sa ma ya h'um /
translated: oṃ sarvatathāgata vajra-dhāra grihṇa samaya hūṃ

original: 'di skad du smros shig / khyod kyis lha'i rigs ma mthong ba dang / las mi shes pa su la yang gsang pa'i las 'di ma smra shig ces bya ba las mi shes pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pas /
analyzed: 'di skad du smros shig / khyod kyis lha'i rigs ma mthong ba dang / las mi shes pa su la yang gsang pa'i las 'di ma smra shig ces bya ba las mi shes pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs pas /
translated: Say this: “Do not speak of this secret rite to anyone who has not seen the deity family and does not know the rite.”

original: las kyi dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba las mi shes pa zhes brjod do //
analyzed: las kyi dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba las mi shes pa zhes brjod do //
translated: One who has not entered the maṇḍala of the rite and has not seen the maṇḍala of the rite is called “ignorant of the rite.”

original: 'dir 'chad par 'gyur pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i gsang ba de thams cad brjod par mi bya'o //
analyzed: 'dir 'chad par 'gyur pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i gsang ba de thams cad brjod par mi bya'o //
translated: Here, all the secrets explained in the maṇḍala of the rite that will be explained should not be spoken.

original: khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes bya ba ni gzir par 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: khyod dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re zhes bya ba ni gzir par 'gyur ba'o //
translated: “Otherwise, your sacred pledge will be broken” means you will be tormented.

original: de nas yon gyi mchog blangs la /
analyzed: de nas yon gyi mchog blangs la /
translated: Then, having accepted the supreme offering,

original: rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug ste /
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgyas me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin du bcug ste /
translated: one should have them hold a flower garland with the mudra of Vajradhara.

original: rdo rje slob dpon rang gi las kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdo rje slob dpon rang gi las kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The vajra master should form the pledge seal of the karma vajra holder,🔽and

original: slob dpon rang nyid kyis las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje 'dzin ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bcings te /
analyzed: slob dpon rang nyid kyis las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje 'dzin ma'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du bcings te /
translated: the master himself should form the pledge seal of the vajra holder of the karma maṇḍala just as it is, and

original: khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing slob ma la dbab par bya'o //
analyzed: khro bo'i lta bas blta zhing slob ma la dbab par bya'o //
translated: he should look with the gaze of wrath and cause the descent to the disciple.

original: slob ma 'di skad brjod du gzhug go //
analyzed: slob ma 'di skad brjod du gzhug go //
translated: The disciple should be made to say this:🔽“Oṃ vajra jñāna!

original: aom badzra dzirya zhes bya ba la sogs pa des 'bab par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: aom badzra dzirya zhes bya ba la sogs pa des 'bab par 'gyur ro //
translated: ” By that, the descent will occur.

original: yang babs na /
analyzed: yang babs na /
translated: If it does not descend again,

original: bdag nyid kyis 'jug par bya ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid kyis 'jug par bya ste /
translated: one should enter oneself,

original: rdo rje shugs kyi snying po 'dis 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje shugs kyi snying po 'dis 'jug par bya'o //
translated: and one should enter with this essence of the vajra impulse:🔽“Oṃ, be opened!🔽Be opened, O vajra!🔽Be entered, O vajra!🔽Be firmly entered, O vajra!

original: aom pra be sha badzra pra be sha badzra a'a be sha badzra aa dhi tishtha badzra h'um /
analyzed: aom pra be sha badzra pra be sha badzra a'a be sha badzra aa dhi tishtha badzra h'um /
translated: Oṃ praveśaya vajra praveśaya vajra āveśaya vajra adhiṣṭhānavajra hūṃ.🔽

original: gal te snga ma'i 'jug pas bya'o zhe na /
analyzed: gal te snga ma'i 'jug pas bya'o zhe na /
translated: If it is asked, “Should one do it with the previous entry?”

original: ma yin te dbab pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma yin te dbab pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: [No,] it is not, because it is merely the descent.

original: 'di nyid kyis babs nas 'jug par bya'o //
analyzed: 'di nyid kyis babs nas 'jug par bya'o //
translated: Having descended with just this, one should enter.

original: de nas snga ma bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams kyis dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya'o //
analyzed: de nas snga ma bzhin du rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa rnams kyis dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya'o //
translated: Then, as before, with the vajra hook and so forth, one should summon, induct, bind, and control.🔽One should worship with the worship of dance of the mudras and the counter-mudras.

original: phyag rgya dang ldan gyi phyag rgya rnams kyi gar gyi mchod pas mchod par bya'o zhes bya ba ni babs pa'i mthus ma brlabs pa'i slob ma rnams kyang rdo rje gser gyi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang / de nas de bkrol na rdo rje chu srin gyi phyag rgya 'ching ba dang /

translated: By the power of the descent of the deity, even the disciples who have not been empowered should form the vajra-golden-fish mudra, and then, having released it, form the vajra-crocodile mudra.

original: de bzhin du rdo rje bza' ba ma'i bar gyi phyag rgya bcings te /
analyzed: de bzhin du rdo rje bza' ba ma'i bar gyi phyag rgya bcings te /
translated: In the same way, one should form the mudras up to the vajra-eating-woman.

original: de nas de bkrol la rdo rje sgo ba ma'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
analyzed: de nas de bkrol la rdo rje sgo ba ma'i phyag rgya bcing bar bya'o //
translated: Then, having released it, one should form the vajra-door-woman mudra.

original: de ltar na de ni phyag rgya dang lan gyi phyag rgya rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa yin no //
analyzed: de ltar na de ni phyag rgya dang lan gyi phyag rgya rnams kyis gar gyi mchod pas mchod pa yin no //
translated: Thus, one should worship with the worship of dance of the mudras and the counter-mudras.

original: de ltar byas par gyur na des ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na deng phyin chad ces bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de ltar byas par gyur na des ci zhig tu 'gyur zhe na deng phyin chad ces bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said, “from now on…”

original: @7a * // deng nas brtsams te /
analyzed: @7a * // deng nas brtsams te /
translated: From now on,

original: las thams cad kyi rdo rje gser la sogs pa'i las byed par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: las thams cad kyi rdo rje gser la sogs pa'i las byed par 'gyur ro //
translated: one will perform the activities of all the karma vajras, such as the karma of gold.

original: gang rnams kyis byed par 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gang rnams kyis byed par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: By what means will one perform them?

original: lus dang ngag dang lta ba dang yid dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyis zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: lus dang ngag dang lta ba dang yid dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya rnams kyis zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It is said, “with the body, speech, gaze, and mind, and with the vajra seals.”

original: de la lus kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa dang / rdo rje rig pa dam pa la sogs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'o //
analyzed: de la lus kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje h'um mdzad la sogs pa dang / rdo rje rig pa dam pa la sogs pa rnams kyi phyag rgya chen po'o //
translated: Therein, the body seal is the great seal of Vajrahumkara, etc., and the sublime knowledge vajra, etc.

original: ngag gi phyag rgya ni de dag gi rig pa'o //
analyzed: ngag gi phyag rgya ni de dag gi rig pa'o //
translated: The speech seal is their knowledge.

original: lta pa'i phyag rgya ni khro bo'i lta ba'o //
analyzed: lta pa'i phyag rgya ni khro bo'i lta ba'o //
translated: The gaze seal is the wrathful gaze.

original: yid kyi phyag rgya ni sgom pa'o //🔽rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje 'bar ba la sogs pa nas //
analyzed: yid kyi phyag rgya ni sgom pa'o // rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni rdo rje 'bar ba la sogs pa nas //
translated: The mind seal is the meditation.🔽The vajra seal is the blazing vajra, etc.,

original: klu'i rdo rje klu'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: klu'i rdo rje klu'i zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i mtshan ma'i phyag rgya'o //
translated: up to the nāga vajra and the seal of the nāga noose.

original: der 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: der 'dod pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Here, desire

original: bsam pa nyid kyis byed pa ste /
analyzed: bsam pa nyid kyis byed pa ste /
translated: means the intention itself.

original: 'di ni phan yon bshad pa yin no //🔽de nas yang gdod g-yogs pa bkrol te zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'di ni phan yon bshad pa yin no // de nas yang gdod g-yogs pa bkrol te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: This is the explanation of the benefits.🔽Then, having removed the blindfold

original: de nas dus phyis gdong g-yogs bkrol par bya'o //
analyzed: de nas dus phyis gdong g-yogs bkrol par bya'o //
translated: means that later, at another time, the blindfold should be removed.

original: bkrol nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar gyi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
analyzed: bkrol nas dngos grub kyi rdo rje brtul zhugs kyi bar gyi dbang bskur bar bya'o //
translated: Having removed it, one should confer the empowerment up to the vajra conduct of spiritual powers.

original: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin to //
analyzed: de'i don ni 'di skad ston pa yin to //
translated: The meaning of that is taught as follows.

original: de ltar gar bya zhing mchod pa byas na yang /
analyzed: de ltar gar bya zhing mchod pa byas na yang /
translated: Thus, having danced and made offerings,

original: de nas slob ma de la slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: de nas slob ma de la slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod do //
translated: then the master should say this to the disciple:

original: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs su zhugs kyis /
analyzed: deng khyod de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs su zhugs kyis /
translated: Today you have entered the vajra family of all tathāgatas.

original: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi grub pa yang thob na /
analyzed: ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi grub pa yang thob na /
translated: By this wisdom, I will cause you to attain the accomplishment of the vajra family of all tathāgatas.

original: dngos grub gzhan lha smos kyang ci dgos te /
analyzed: dngos grub gzhan lha smos kyang ci dgos te /
translated: What need is there to mention other accomplishments?

original: khyod kyis las kyi dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra shig //
analyzed: khyod kyis las kyi dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba rnams la ma smra shig //
translated: Do not speak of this to those who have not seen the maṇḍala of activity.

original: dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /
analyzed: dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re /

original: de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: de nas rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya bcings la 'di skad ces brjod do //

translated: “Do not speak of this secret activity to anyone who has not seen the family of deities and does not know the activity. Be careful not to break your sacred pledge.”

original: de nas rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya kha thur dang / gyen du bstan pa bcings te /
analyzed: de nas rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid rdo rje 'dzin ma'i phyag rgya kha thur dang / gyen du bstan pa bcings te /
translated: Then, the vajra master him or herself forms the mudra of Vajradhara with the hands facing down and up,

original: slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod do //
analyzed: slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag la 'di skad ces brjod do //

original: 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig rdo rje yin gyis /
analyzed: 'di ni khyod kyi dam tshig rdo rje yin gyis /
translated: “This is your sacred pledge vajra.

original: gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro //🔽de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / mna'i chu snying pos sngags la /
analyzed: gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro // de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya de nyid dang / mna'i chu snying pos sngags la /

original: slob ma de 'thung du gzhug go //
analyzed: slob ma de 'thung du gzhug go //

analyzed: de la mna'i snying po ni 'di yin te / rdo rje @7b sems dpa' deng khyod kyi //

original: snying la yang dag zhugs par 'gyur //
analyzed: snying la yang dag zhugs par 'gyur //

original: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
analyzed: gal te tshul 'di smras na ni //
translated: If you speak of this method,

original: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //
analyzed: de ma thag tu dral te gshegs //

original: aom badzra au ta ka tha zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
analyzed: aom badzra au ta ka tha zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis so //
translated: With the method of Om, Vajra-bind, bind!🔽 Then, say this to the disciple:

analyzed: khyod kyis da la brnyas pa ma byed cig / mi bde pa ma spangs pas dus byas nas dmyal par ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la /

analyzed: 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlob la /

analyzed: de nas de rdo rje 'bebs pa'i phyag rgya dang / badzra a'a be sha aa: zhes bya ba'i snying po 'dis dbab pa bskyed par bya'o //

original: de nas me tog dor ro //
analyzed: de nas me tog dor ro //
translated: Then, cast the flower.

analyzed: snying po ni 'di yin te /

analyzed: de nas de bzhin du gdong g-yogs dgrol lo //

analyzed: snying po ni 'di yin te /

analyzed: aom rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyis // mig 'byed par ni brtson par mdzad // rdo rje'i mig ni bla med pa //

analyzed: de bzhin du gang gi tshe khro bo rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya gnyis su byas pa de'i tshe khro bo rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o // khro bo rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya byed pa na khro bo rdo rje gnod spyin gyi phyag rgya'o //
translated: Likewise, when the seal of Krodha-Vajrasattva is made double, it is the seal of Krodha-Vajramuṣṭi.🔽When the seal of Krodha-Vajrarāja is made, it is the seal of Krodha-Vajayakṣa.

original: khro bo rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya byed pa na khro bo rdo rje srung pa'i phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: khro bo rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya byed pa na khro bo rdo rje srung pa'i phyag rgya'o //

original: rdo rje legs pa'i phyag rgya byed pa na rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje legs pa'i phyag rgya byed pa na rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya'o //

analyzed: rdo rje glu ma bya'o //

analyzed: rdo rje bdug pa ma byed pa na /

analyzed: rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya byed pa na /

analyzed: rdo rje bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya byed pa na /

analyzed: rdo rje 'bar ma'i phyag rgya bya'o //

analyzed: rdo rje dbyig mchog ma'i phyag rgya byed pa na /

analyzed: mgyogs ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bya'o //

analyzed: rdo rje rked bcings ma'i phyag rgya byed pa na /

analyzed: rdo rje pho nya ma'i phyag rgya bya'o //

analyzed: rdo rje 'ju ma'i phyag rgya byed pa na ;
translated: When performing the mudra of Vajra-Dissolver,

analyzed: rdo rje dbang mo'i phyag rgya bya'o //

analyzed: rdo rje za ba mo'i phyag rgya byed pa na /

analyzed: rdo rje sgo ba ma'i phyag rgya bya'o //

original: 'jig rten pa'i dam tshig gi khu tshur gnyis su byas na /
analyzed: 'jig rten pa'i dam tshig gi khu tshur gnyis su byas na /

analyzed: gar byas pa las byung pa'i phyag rgya bcings par bya'o //

original: khro bo rdo rje rig pa dam pa'i phyag rgya byed pa na /
analyzed: khro bo rdo rje rig pa dam pa'i phyag rgya byed pa na /
translated: When making the mudra of the wrathful sublime knowledge vajra,

original: rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya gnyis kyis gar byed pa ni mchod pa'i phyag rgya yin gyi lan gyi phyag rgya ni med do //
analyzed: rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya gnyis kyis gar byed pa ni mchod pa'i phyag rgya yin gyi lan gyi phyag rgya ni med do //
translated: the dance of the two vajra mudras is the offering mudra, but there is no reply mudra.

original: 'di dag ni gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so //
analyzed: 'di dag ni gar gyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so //
translated: These are the pristine awarenesses of the mudras of dance offering.

original: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad dang / rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi h'um mdzad dang / rdo rje rigs pa mchog la sogs pa nas /
analyzed: de la rdo rje h'um mdzad dang / rin chen dang / chos dang / las kyi h'um mdzad dang / rdo rje rigs pa mchog la sogs pa nas /
translated: With respect to that, one should know that Vajrahūṃkāra, Ratnahūṃkāra, Dharmaḥūṃkāra, Karmahūṃkāra, Vajramatottama, and so on,

original: rdo rje chu srin gyi mthar thug pa ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin par shes par bya'o //
analyzed: rdo rje chu srin gyi mthar thug pa ni 'jig rten gsum gyi 'khor lo'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor las bshad pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya yin par shes par bya'o //
translated: up to Vajramakaradhvaja are the pledge seals explained in the Three Worlds Wheel Dhāraṇī maṇḍala.

original: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams nas /
analyzed: khro bo rdo rje sems dpa' nas brtsams nas /
translated: Beginning with the wrathful Vajrasattva

original: khro bo rdo rje dril bu ma'i mthar thug pa rnams ni /
analyzed: khro bo rdo rje dril bu ma'i mthar thug pa rnams ni /
translated: up to the wrathful Vajraghantā,
